alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 29 at 6:52AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Snow and blowing snow will continue across northern Nevada through 9AM this morning... A persistent band of snow showers are running across portions of northern Lander/Eureka and Elko counties, and over I-80. This area of shower activity is expected to continue through the morning hours. Remote observation platforms have picked up about one to two inches of dry snow already and another one to two inches can be expected through 9 am. Roads impacted will include I-80 from Battle Mountain to Wells, State Routes 225, 226, and 227, as well as portions of US Highway 93 from HD Summit to south of Clover Valley in central Elko county. If driving this morning on area roadways, please use caution as they may be snow covered and slippery. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
